===============================
Handling provenance information
===============================

.. currentmodule:: sumatra.records

The records module defines the :class:`Record` class, which gathers and stores
information about an individual simulation or analysis run.

.. autoclass:: Record
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :inherited-members:
   :show-inheritance:
   


.. autoclass:: RecordDifference
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :inherited-members:
   :show-inheritance:
